sentences.en: " Long, long ago, there was an old man whose name was Yu Gong . "
sentences.cn: 很久以前, 有个名叫 愚公 的老人.

sentences.en: But why does the King call for Gong - gil so often?
sentences.cn: 那为何王如此频繁的召见孔吉 呢 ?

sentences.en: Face by abrade hind, good blacken of Gong Heigong how to do?
sentences.cn: 脸被擦伤后, 好了变黑红黑红的怎么办?

sentences.en: How can you be so certain that the market's gong bearish? "
Li and Gong went over to have a look at it.
sentences.cn: 李、宫二人走上前去仔细查看.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the prognosis of mental disorders associated with Qi - Gong.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨首次诊断为气功所致精神障碍患者的预后.

sentences.en: On the street, the watchman's gong resounded deep and mournful - once, twice. It was ten o'clock.
sentences.cn: 在街中响着锣声,沉重而悲怆, 二更锣敲了.

sentences.en: On the stroke of seven, a gong summons guests into the dining-room.
sentences.cn: 7点整时一阵锣声将客人召集到餐厅。

sentences.en: Photo thirty - one : one reporter bought some snacks for Gong Jinghong.
sentences.cn: 图 三十一: 有一位记者,买了一些零食送给龚京红.

sentences.en: She might have gong to the lab with her teacher.
sentences.cn: 她可能跟她的老师一起去了实验室.

sentences.en: Some exclamations: When knocking gong to sell electricity, arrived!
sentences.cn: 有的则惊呼: 敲着铜锣卖电的时候到了!

sentences.en: Spike Milligan has finally got the gong he had been promised.
sentences.cn: 斯派克·米利根最终拿到了早就承诺给他的那块奖章。

sentences.en: The gong thundered more frequently and more furiously.
sentences.cn: 锣声响得更匆促、更剧烈了.

sentences.en: Theresa and Charles aren't gong to rent this apartment.
sentences.cn: 特里萨和查尔斯不想租这套公寓.

trans.tran_cn: 锣，钟状物，〈俚〉奖章，纪念章
trans.tran_en: a round piece of metal that hangs in a frame and which you hit with a stick to give a deep ringing sound. It is used as a musical instrument or to announce that a meal is ready.

trans.tran_cn: 鸣锣传唤；鸣锣命令驾车者停驶
